trans-unit.source: Marshals the COM <see langword="IDispatchEx" /> interface to either the .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Expando.IExpando" /> interface, or to the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> interface, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 将 COM <see langword="IDispatchEx" /> 接口封送处理到 .NET Framework <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Expando.IExpando" /> 接口，或封送处理到 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> 接口，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Because the CLR does not use this custom marshaler automatically, it must be declared as follows:
trans-unit.target: 因为 CLR 不自动使用此自定义封送处理程序，必须如下声明：

trans-unit.source: The managed object to be destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 要销毁的托管对象。

trans-unit.source: Performs necessary cleanup of the managed data when it is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 不再需要时执行必要的托管数据的清除。

trans-unit.source: The CLR calls this method to clean up managed data allocated in the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler.MarshalManagedToNative%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: CLR 调用此方法来清理中分配的托管数据<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler.MarshalManagedToNative%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged data to be destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 指向要销毁的非托管数据的指针。

trans-unit.source: Performs necessary cleanup of the unmanaged data when it is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 不再需要时执行必要的非托管数据的清除。

trans-unit.source: The CLR calls this method to clean up the unmanaged data allocated in the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler.MarshalManagedToNative%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: CLR 调用此方法来清理中分配的非托管数据<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler.MarshalManagedToNative%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: String "cookie" parameter that can be used by the custom marshaler.
trans-unit.target: 可以由自定义封送拆收器使用的字符串“cookie”参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the custom marshaler.
trans-unit.target: 返回自定义封送拆收器的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the custom marshaler.
trans-unit.target: 自定义封送拆收器的实例。

trans-unit.source: All custom marshalers must implement this method, although it is not part of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler> interface definition.
trans-unit.target: 尽管这不是，所有自定义封必须实现此方法的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler>接口定义。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pstrCookie" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pstrCookie" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size in bytes of the unmanaged data to be marshaled.
trans-unit.target: 返回要封送处理的非托管数据的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: -1 to indicate the type this marshaler handles is not a value type.
trans-unit.target: -1 指示此封送拆收器处理的类型不是值类型。

trans-unit.source: Because custom marshaling of value types is not supported in the .NET Framework, this method always returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 由于.NET Framework 不支持自定义封送处理值类型，此方法始终返回-1。

trans-unit.source: The managed object to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的托管对象。

trans-unit.source: Marshals an object from managed code to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 将一个对象从托管代码封送处理到非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged object.
trans-unit.target: 指向非托管对象的指针。

trans-unit.source: The CLR calls this method with the specified instance of a managed object to convert that object from managed code to unmanaged code, and it returns a pointer to the appropriate unmanaged object, representing the COM view of that object.
trans-unit.target: CLR 调用此方法使用指定的实例托管的对象来将该对象从托管代码转换到非托管代码，并将指针返回到相应的非托管对象，表示该对象的 COM 视图。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pManagedObj" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pManagedObj" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged object to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 指向要转换的非托管对象的指针。

trans-unit.source: Marshals an object from unmanaged code to managed code.
trans-unit.target: 将一个对象从非托管代码封送处理到托管代码。

trans-unit.source: A managed object.
trans-unit.target: 一个托管对象。

trans-unit.source: The CLR calls this method with the specified pointer to an unmanaged object to convert that object from unmanaged code to managed code, and returns a managed object representing the managed view of the unmanaged data.
trans-unit.target: CLR 使用指向要将该对象从非托管代码转换为托管代码的非托管对象的指定指针调用此方法，并返回一个表示非托管数据的托管的视图的托管的对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pNativeData" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pNativeData" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
